instruction: Summarize the paper entitled "Learning to Focus with Soft Attention"
output: The paper "Learning to Focus with Soft Attention" examines the use of soft attention networks to enable deep learning algorithms to better focus on important parts of input data in order to improve their performance. The paper presents a new approach to soft attention models that relies on training a soft attention network to learn patterns in large datasets and then use these patterns to focus on more important details of the data it is looking at. The authors test the efficacy of this system by comparing it to existing methods and demonstrate that the model performs better in tasks such as image classification and text summarization.
